enhanced_description: Sodexo is a global service provider dedicated to improving Quality of Life services across various settings, including work, healthcare, education, and leisure. The company's comprehensive portfolio encompasses Food Services, Facilities Management Services, and Hospitality services through Sodexo Live!. For nearly 60 years, Sodexo has been known for its culinary excellence, developing and testing recipes to reflect the latest trends. Their Facilities Management expertise covers a wide range of services, including technical service management, assets management, building maintenance, access control, deep cleaning, energy management, space planning, and project management. Sodexo Live! specializes in creating exceptional moments and lasting memories at venues such as stadia, arenas, convention and conference centers, zoos, and museums. From an HR technology perspective, Sodexo provides solutions focused on Total Rewards, including Benefits & Reward services, Employee Motivation technology, and Employee Recognition software, aiming to improve employee happiness, engagement, satisfaction, and well-being. The core purpose is to create a better everyday for everyone, fostering a better life for all.
